text: The Extraordinary Adventures of Mr. West in the Land of the Bolsheviks () is a 1924 Soviet silent comedy movie directed by Lev Kuleshov.Необычайные приключения мистера Веста в стране большевиков (1924)Увидят ли школьники 100 фильмов, рекомендованных Минкультом It stars Porfiri Podobed, Boris Barnet, and Aleksandra Khokhlova. ==Actors== * Porfiri Podobed - Mr. John West * Boris Barnet - Jeddy - the cowboy * Aleksandra Khokhlova - The 'Countess' * Vsevolod Pudovkin - Zhban * Sergey Komarov - The One-Eyed Man == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1924 comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Lev Kuleshov Category:Movies set in Moscow Category:Movies set in Ohio
title: The Extraordinary Adventures of Mr. West in the Land of the Bolsheviks
